name: git-workspace-mcp-extension
description: Intelligent Git workspace management with AI-guided file operations

scripts.build: echo "No build process required for pure Node.js extension"
scripts.validate: node --input-type=module -e "import {readFileSync} from 'fs'; JSON.parse(readFileSync('manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('âœ… Manifest is valid JSON');"
scripts.package: zip -r git-workspace-v1.0.0.dxt manifest.json server/ package.json README.md LICENSE icon.svg -x '.git/*' '*.dxt'
